comment.author: 10905459@N06
comment._content: Flew out of Dong Ha on one on my first R&R!!! I was in full combat gear with my M-14. The field kept on getting hit by mortars every time he try to land. The pilot radioed the control shack and told them to tell me to start running down the runway and they would have the tail gate down. I started running, the plane slowed and the crew grabbed me and dragged me on board!!! True story!!!

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/10905459@N06] Great story! Glad you made it safe.
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
